titleStmt.title: King Charles the First, no man of blood: but a martyr for his people· Or, a sad, and impartiall enquiry, whether the King or Parliament began the warre, which hath so much ruined, and undon the kingdom of England? and who was in the defensive part of it?
titleStmt.author: Philipps, Fabian, 1601-1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
